channel.title: Difference between whonix gateway and workstation? What is needed for kali
channel.description: So was trying to set up Kali to run through whonix on virtualbox. I downloaded whonix XFCE linux for VBOX and imported it into virtualbox. Once that is done can i get rid of the workstation since i would just be using Kali for that or do i still need that? All I need is gateway right. If anyone can point me to up to date instructions on running Kali through virtualbox I would appreciate it. Thank you.

item.title: Difference between whonix gateway and workstation? What is needed for kali

item.title: Difference between whonix gateway and workstation? What is needed for kali
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Allow discussion anonymous pentesting in Whonix forums? Organization
Update In short: banned Like many tools, Tor / Whonix itself is a dual use tool. Due to Tor usage statistics (http://planete.inrialpes.fr/papers/TorTraffic-NSS10.pdf) and low rates of abuse, I believe that on average, Tor does more good than harm. Are there any statistics on pentesting tools, on their good/harm ratio? I am not sure the combination of anonymity and pentesting is a useful one. Which legitimate use cases come to your mind? At the moment I believe making anonymous pentestiâ€¦

Read full topic

So was trying to set up Kali to run through whonix on virtualbox. I downloaded whonix XFCE linux for VBOX and imported it into virtualbox. Once that is done can i get rid of the workstation since i would just be using Kali for that or do i still need that? All I need is gateway right. If anyone can point me to up to date instructions on running Kali through virtualbox I would appreciate it. Thank you.
